description.value: Code system of concepts identifying the response of the previously issued command. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the Equipment Command Response (ECR) and Interaction Status Detail (ISD) segments.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0387 (Command Response)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Command cannot be completed within requested completion time

definition.value: Command cannot be completed within requested completion time

display.value: Command cannot be completed because of error condition

definition.value: Command cannot be completed because of error condition

display.value: Command cannot be completed because of the status of the requested equipment

definition.value: Command cannot be completed because of the status of the requested equipment

display.value: Command cannot be completed for unknown reasons

definition.value: Command cannot be completed for unknown reasons
